Smartphones are turning back into dumbphones. We have to fight back!

To squeeze a little extra battery out of your phone, Android device vendors listed below (with their bad vendor score) cripple apps and make them useless. Read more

#1 Nokia

#2 OnePlus

#3 Xiaomi

#4 Huawei

#5 Meizu

#6 Sony

#7 Samsung

#8 HTC

#9 Stock Android

Other vendors

This site is open-source, and the code is available on Github.
Contributions, as well as discussion, are very welcome!
